data.title: Afterglow
data.meta_description: Find out how to watch Afterglow. Stream Afterglow, watch trailers, see the cast, and more at TV Guide
data.text:
68 Metascore

1997

1 hr 53 mins

Comedy

R

Watchlist

Haunted by painful memories from their past, two unhappy married couples find themselves embroiled in an illicit affair. A critically acclaimed story highlighted by Julie Christie's performance, which earned her a nomination for Best Actress. Nick Nolte, Lara Flynn Boyle, Jonny Lee Miller, Alan Rudolph, Jay Underwood, Domini Blythe, Yves Corbeil, Genevieve Bissonnette, Robert Altman.
